column5: My house is in a Master-Planned community w/lots of green space, parks, playgrounds, jogging trail & ponds. The living space is modern, spacious, w/an open floor plan, beautifully furnished w/1 king sized bed & 3 queen sized beds. Close proximity to city attractions including 25 mins from Downtown Houston, 10 mins from Bush intercontinental airport & many energy companies along beltway 8. There are several attractions; restaurants, movie theater, bowling alley, shopping center, & grocery stores.
